#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

long long int func(int beg,int last)
{
if(last-beg==1||last-beg==0)
return 1;
return func(beg,last-1)*2*(2*(last-beg)-1)/((last-beg)+1);
}
int main()
{
ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
int t;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
char a[100];
cin>>a;
cout<<func(0,strlen(a)-1)<<endl;
}
}
